description: A generalized data model template for Publications to be hopefully used across dccs
Template for raw mass spec-based proteomics data.
Abstract template for data from some assay of protein structure and function. Data should be instantiated with more specific template.
General template for typically tabular **individual-level** data. This can include repeated measures and a drug treatment context.

A template defining basic metadata on deposited data artifacts (i.e. files) from experimental assays involving biosamples.  This is an abstract template; "real" template subclasses define additional properties appropriate for the type of data file (e.g. imaging vs sequencing).
Template for describing raw data from single-cell RNA-seq.
General template for raw RNA/DNA data, i.e. sequence data from a sequencing assay.
General template for data in tabular form that aggregates tissue-level or cellular-level data.
General template for describing data for a materials science assay.
Describes data artifacts (i.e. files) from an experimental/physical-sciences assay  where input specimens are more at the level of synthesized molecules or inorganic materials.
Template for describing raw data from (bulk) RNA-sequencing
General template for raw (level 1) RNA/DNA data, i.e. sequence data from a sequencing assay.
Specimen-level data, whether from human or animal.
//nf.synapse.org/Explore/Studies.
General template for describing imaging data.
A slightly more specialized publication concept intended for the specific scope of the NF Portal.
Genomics assay template but with additional experiment data.
Alias to BulkSequencingAssayTemplate, use for sequence data on a large scale when there is no template available that is more specific.
Template for array- and immuno-based proteomics data.
Raw genomics data from patient-derived xenograft (PDX) experiment, with additional PDX-relevant metadata.
Template for describing raw data from epigenetics sequencing assays such as bisulfite sequencing.
Template for dynamic or static light scattering data adapted from ISA-TAB-Nano specs.
Template for describing aligned reads (e.g. BAM/CRAM files) from a sequencing assay. The QC meta are extracted from samtools stats when available and are the same metrics preferred by GDC.
Template for describing raw data from ChIP-Seq assays, typically used to identify DNA-protein interactions.
For aggregated data from defined populations or cohorts, used in/derived from epidemiology studies.

Data of biosamples from human patients. Adapted from Table 2 of http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HUL.InstRepos:32725809. This template should be used when biosamples are from NF patients to provides a more valuable characterization and make additional gene-phenotype insights possible.
//bioschemas.org/profiles/LabProtocol/0.7-DRAFT.
Template for quantified gene/protein expression data that are still represented as one file per sample.
A template for describing raw data from array-based genomics/epigenomics, e.g. CEL files.

Template for relatively raw data of RNA/DNA structure and expression.  This is an abstract template encapsulating data from low-throughput to high-throughput assays,  sequencing-based or non-sequencing based (e.g. microarrays, optical genome mapping).  In practice, data are more specifically typed and matched to one of the templates below.
Alias to MassSpecAssayTemplate for backwards-compatibility.
Template for describing raw data from Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS)

Further processed data with multiple samples aggregated into one file. This may be also be known as level-4 data. Unlike level-2 and level-3 data, individual-level attributes such as age and sex are no longer surfaced on the data file directly.
Metadata template for updating milestone report values in NF studies -- currently a supported feature for NTAP and GFF.
Template for raw data files (idat) from DNA methylation arrays.
Generic template for describing data from a pharmacokinetics assay.
Template for raw electrophysiology data (electrical recordings).
Template for data from a microscopy data.
Template for describing immunofluorescence or immunohistochemistry images.
Template for non-human individual-level data.
Generic template for describing data from a plate-based reporter assay.
Template for describing MRI data.
Template for describing raw data from Whole Exome Sequencing (WES/WXS)
Template for describing scripts or software code.
Template for behavioral assay data from model organisms measuring behaviors such as feeding, learning, memory, motor coordination, and activity patterns.
Alias for EpigenomicsAssayTemplate for backwards-compatibility.
Template for describing either simple germline/somatic variant calls output data (VCF/MAF) as well as structural variants (e.g. CNVs).
//nf.synapse.org/Explore/Datasets.
Template for flow cytometry assay
